name: Porygon2
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: Further research enhanced its abilities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.

poke_power.name: Mapping
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you play Porygon2 from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may search your deck for a Stadium card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: 3-D Attack
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
